about_the_game:
VALKYRIE'S LEGACY – AN EPIC SOULSLIKE ADVENTURE IN A MYTHOLOGICAL WORLD

In a world where the fall of the Valkyrie leader led to the end of the entire order, humanity lost hope of reaching Valhalla, for there were no more Valkyries to guide them. Without the promise of an afterlife, decay took hold of the mortal world, plunging it into despair and chaos. In this desolate setting, you must rise as Svana and embark on a perilous journey through the Nordic Realms, seeking the legendary Eye of the World to prevent it from falling into the hands of malevolent forces that could doom all realms to an even worse fate.

• A Vastly Immersive World
Explore the breathtaking landscapes of the Nordic Realms, from the dark caverns of Svartalfheim to the towering mountains of Jotunheim. Each realm is uniquely designed, featuring open fields, narrow paths, menacing dungeons, and hidden passages. Experience the thrill of uncovering ancient secrets and facing formidable enemies lurking in the shadows, where every victory brings a deep sense of accomplishment.

• Develop Your Attributes According to Your Strategy
As you progress on your journey, develop Svana’s attributes to suit your preferred playstyle. Whether you choose to wield powerful weapons, master deadly magic, or excel in agility and dexterity, the game offers a wide range of options to customize the character's growth. Become a relentless warrior, a cunning strategist, or a master of mystical forces – the choice is yours.

• An Epic Saga Rooted in Norse Mythology
Immerse yourself in a multifaceted narrative inspired by Norse mythology. Engage in a complex tale of gods, giants, and mortals, where alliances are not always clear. As Svana, your quest for the Eye of the World will uncover ancient truths, and ultimately, you must decide whom to trust and which path to follow.

VALKYRIE'S LEGACY is more than just a game – it’s an unforgettable journey through a world of myths and legends, where every battle tests your courage, every decision matters, and the fate of the Nordic Realms rests in your hands.

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
